    PtolemyQuery

    public static class PtolemyQuery.ActionableEntry
extends javax.swing.Box
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, SettableQueryChooser
    Panel containing an entry box and button that performs the action specified by an Actionable.

      • ActionableEntry

        public ActionableEntry(Query owner,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String defaultValue,
                       Actionable actionable)
        Create a panel containing an entry box and a color chooser.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner query
        name - The name of the query
        defaultValue - The initial default color of the color chooser.
        actionable - The specification for the action.
